header_text: Your roof has a leak, and water comes into the house every time it rains. You think it is going to be expensive to hire someone to fix it. As you think about paying the bill to have the roof fixed, you feel that you will be fine.

elements.Text: Will you be broke after paying the bill for fixing the roof?
